Most Illustrious Sir Piratini, September 4, 1838.

Having the Government finally established a newspaper with the purpose of guiding the brave people of Rio Grande regarding the course of matters that concern them, through the publication of the proceedings of the Secretariats of State and official correspondence with the Generals, Commanders of Forces of the Republican Army and Police, and being unable, given the repeated shortages of the army, to distribute the aforementioned newspaper free of charge, it employs Your Lordship

The names of the subscribers shall be sent to Luís Rossetti, editor of said newspaper.

God keep Your Lordship, Domingos José de Almeida

Official letter from the Excellent One dated September 4, received on the 10th of the same month, concerning the periodical.
